name: The Black Lamp
description:
This game was created for a monthly game jam challenge. The theme was: DESCENT. This game is non commerical, free to download, but do not distribute or modify. I used music from other creative people (credited in the game), I hope to get clearance for using these, otherwise current content may change. I do not accept payment for this game in its current form.

You have 20 minutes to dig your way through 10 levels, before the ocean svallow the island again.

Use LEFT-RIGHT or A-D to move left or right, or gamepad sticks or Dpad. Hold SPACE or gamepad A to enter drill mode. Use directions to drill in any 8 directions.

There are a number of treasures to collect on every level to activate exit door. You can leave behind 1 treasure out of every 6 to make it easier (1 out of 6,  1 out of 11, 2 out of 12, etc.).
